title: The Supreme Recipe
full_text:
The Supreme Recipe
Close

Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
apple brandy
1/2
ounce
lemon
or
lime juice
(I prefer lime)
1/4
ounce
orgeat
Dash
of
real pomegranate grenadine
Directions
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well for 10 seconds and strain into chilled cocktail glass.
